name: blink (itch) (melodyP)
description:
It is time.

You must go.

-~-

The cooler Blink Twice If You're Able To Breathe. This more or less keeps a similar premise, but most if not all events are majorly changed from the original 2020 game. There still might be some cheesiness here and there, but there's not as much as the original...hopefully.

-~-

Contains: Monochromatics, an introspective into the lifestyle of an introvert plagued with emptiness, a might-be origin story, mirrors, the rain...and a single ending, because who needs more of 'em?

Content Warnings: Therapeutic jargon, slight religious theming, disturbing themes, mentions of violence, the bad type of surreality, and one tragic might-be origin story. You've been warned.

-~-

Who is Adam Le Doux? The one who created Bitsy, the engine used to create this story. Should you support him? Absolutely.
